metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13289 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In Xpdf 4.01.01, there is a use-after-free vulnerability in the functionJBIG2Stream::close() located at JBIG2Stream.cc. It can, for example, betriggered by sending a crafted PDF document to the pdftoppm tool.

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
